page.title: 01Monynut Edge, Lammermuir
page.content: Exposed heather covered hills about 400m. Height average rainfall 25" large area recently planted with conifers as economic alternative to sheep farming. Red grouse shot on open hill. On north edge of Monyut edge very steep sided valleys eroded by melt waters after last ice age. Now important semi-natural woods, mainly birch in some of these valleys and Ling hope valley comprises part of the east Lammermuir Deans nature reserve managed by the Scottish Wildlife Trust, Chichness only settlement in this area - farmsteading.
